meanings.definition: Lack of protection or ability to defend oneself.
meanings.sent1: The defenselessness of the small kitten made it an easy target for the bully.
meanings.sent2: The defenselessness of the baby bird left it exposed to predators in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The defenselessness of the fluffy bunny was evident as it tried to scare away a butterfly.
meanings.sent4: The defenselessness of the fragile flower in the storm symbolized vulnerability.
meanings.sent5: The defenselessness of the lost child tugged at the heartstrings of the kind stranger.

meanings.sent1: The defenselessness of the old house attracted thieves looking for an easy target.
meanings.sent2: The defenselessness of the injured deer made it an easy prey for the hungry wolves.
meanings.sent3: The defenselessness of the ripe fruit tempted the mischievous squirrel to take a bite.
meanings.sent4: The defenselessness of the exposed wire posed a danger to anyone passing by.
meanings.sent5: The defenselessness of the fragile glass ornament made it susceptible to shattering.
